aries.description: Thinking is intuitive and decisive. Communicates with frankness and often lacks patience for details.

taurus.description: Thoughts are grounded and constructive. Learns slowly but retains everything; prefers tangible ideas over abstract theory.

gemini.description: The mind is quick, curious, and adaptable. Thrives on variety and conversation but may lack focus.

cancer.description: Communication is colored by emotion. exceptional memory and learns best through feeling and connection.

leo.description: expresses ideas with warmth and authority. Thinking is creative and often centered around self-expression.

virgo.description: The mind is logical and detail-oriented. Excellent at discernment and organizing information efficiently.

libra.description: Communicates with charm and tact. Weighs all sides of an issue, often leading to hesitation in decision-making.

scorpio.description: Thinking is investigative and penetrating. Interested in hidden truths and communicates with calculated depth.

sagittarius.description: The mind is broad and visionary. Interested in big ideas and truth, often overlooking details or social niceties.

capricorn.description: Thinking is disciplined and result-oriented. values precision and plans for the long term.

aquarius.description: The mind is innovative and objective. Thrives on abstract concepts and future-oriented thinking.

pisces.description: Thinking is imaginative and non-linear. Communicates through symbols and feelings rather than cold logic.

aries.description: Loves the thrill of the chase. Expresses affection directly and forcefully but may lose interest quickly.

taurus.description: Values physical touch, comfort, and stability. Love is expressed through tangible gifts and consistent presence.

gemini.description: Needs mental stimulation in relationships. Values conversation and variety over deep emotional heaviness.

cancer.description: Love is nurturing and deeply attached. Seeks safety and emotional bonding, often treating partners like family.

leo.description: loves to be adored and to show off their partner. Affection is warm, grand, and centered on loyalty.

virgo.description: Expresses love through acts of service and attention to detail. Can be reserved and seeks a practical partnership.

libra.description: Values partnership above all. Seeks beauty, peace, and intellectual connection in relationships.

scorpio.description: Love is all-or-nothing. Seeks deep soul fusion and absolute loyalty; prone to jealousy but intensely devoted.

sagittarius.description: Needs freedom in relationships. Bonds through shared travel, philosophy, and humor rather than clinginess.

capricorn.description: Approaches relationships with responsibility. Values longevity, respect, and traditional structures in love.

aquarius.description: Values friendship and intellectual rapport. Needs personal space and dislikes traditional relationship rules.

pisces.description: Loves with compassion and boundlessness. Prone to idealizing partners and merging emotionally.

aries.description: Energy is high and easily triggered. Acts on impulse and enjoys a challenge.

taurus.description: Action is slow to start but unstoppable once moving. Anger is rare but formidable.

gemini.description: Energy is mental and nervous. Fights with words and scatters energy across many projects.

cancer.description: Acts to protect self and others. Anger is expressed through moodiness or passive-aggression.

leo.description: Driven by the need for recognition. Actions are grand and confident; anger comes from wounded pride.

virgo.description: Energy is focused on work and perfection. Expresses irritation through criticism and nervousness.

libra.description: Action is weighed carefully to avoid conflict. often indecisive but fights for fairness.

scorpio.description: Energy is controlled and intense. Acts with lethal precision and holds grudges; power-driven.

sagittarius.description: Driven by ideals and adventure. Actions are bold and sometimes reckless; anger flares and vanishes quickly.

capricorn.description: Energy is directed toward goals. calculating and persistent; suppresses anger for professional gain.

aquarius.description: Acts in unpredictable bursts. Driven by freedom and reform; fights for causes rather than personal slights.

pisces.description: Energy fluctuates with mood. often struggles with direct confrontation, preferring to flow around obstacles.

jupiter.generic_formula: Grows and finds luck through [Sign Quality]

saturn.generic_formula: Faces challenges and builds mastery in [Sign Quality]

uranus.description: The generational style of rebellion and innovation. (Changes every 7 years)

neptune.description: The generational style of dreams, spirituality, and illusions. (Changes every 14 years)

pluto.description: The generational style of power, transformation, and deep psychology. (Changes every 12-30 years)

sun_in_house.1: Vitality is tied to self-image. Needs to be seen as a leader or pioneer.
sun_in_house.2: Identity is built on wealth and values. Seeks security through material accumulation.
sun_in_house.3: Shines through communication and learning. Identifies as a messenger or thinker.
sun_in_house.4: Identity is private. Focuses energy on home, family, and emotional roots.
sun_in_house.5: Radiates energy through creativity, romance, and children. Needs to perform.
sun_in_house.6: Finds purpose in work, service, and health routines. Identifies as a problem-solver.
sun_in_house.7: Identity is mirrored in others. vitalized by partnerships and one-on-one connection.
sun_in_house.8: Shines in hidden realms. Drawn to crisis, transformation, and deep psychology.
sun_in_house.9: Identity is linked to beliefs and travel. Seeks meaning and expansive experiences.
sun_in_house.10: Vitality is channeled into career. Needs public recognition and authority.
sun_in_house.11: Shines in groups. Identifies with friends, social causes, and the future.
sun_in_house.12: Identity is hidden or spiritual. Needs solitude and works best behind the scenes.

moon_in_house.1: Emotions are worn on the sleeve. Sensitive to environment and immediate reactions.
moon_in_house.2: Emotional security depends on financial stability and possessions.
moon_in_house.3: Finds comfort in talking and learning. Emotions are intellectualized.
moon_in_house.4: Deeply attached to home and family. Needs a sanctuary to feel safe.
moon_in_house.5: Emotional needs met through play, romance, and creative self-expression.
moon_in_house.6: Finds comfort in routine and being useful. Worries affect health.
moon_in_house.7: Emotional security comes from having a partner. Dislikes being alone.
moon_in_house.8: Needs intense emotional merging. Finds safety in digging into secrets and taboos.
moon_in_house.9: Finds comfort in freedom, travel, and philosophy. Restless if fenced in.
moon_in_house.10: Emotions are public. Needs to feel respected and successful to feel safe.
moon_in_house.11: Finds emotional safety in friendship and belonging to a group.
moon_in_house.12: Emotions are private and often hidden. Needs retreat to process feelings.

saturn_in_house.1: Reserved and serious demeanor. Lessons in self-confidence and identity.
saturn_in_house.2: Fears regarding money. Lessons in building tangible value through hard work.
saturn_in_house.3: Serious thinker. Lessons in communication and overcoming speech/learning hurdles.
saturn_in_house.4: Heavy childhood atmosphere. Lessons in building one's own emotional foundation.
saturn_in_house.5: Blocked creativity or heavy approach to fun. Lessons in finding joy.
saturn_in_house.6: Hard worker. Lessons in health, daily service, and perfectionism.
saturn_in_house.7: Delayed marriage or mature partners. Lessons in commitment and boundaries.
saturn_in_house.8: Fear of intimacy. Lessons in trust, shared resources, and psychological depth.
saturn_in_house.9: Conservative beliefs. Lessons in higher education and defining one's own truth.
saturn_in_house.10: Ambitions are delayed but enduring. Lessons in authority and public reputation.
saturn_in_house.11: Few but loyal friends. Lessons in social integration and long-term goals.
saturn_in_house.12: Hidden fears. Lessons in solitude, spirituality, and dissolving the ego.

conjunction.description: Two planets blend their energies together. Can be positive or intense depending on the planets.

opposition.description: Two planets are at odds, creating a 'tug-of-war'. Requires balance and compromise.

trine.description: Energy flows effortlessly between planets. Represents natural talents and luck.

square.description: Internal conflict that generates action. The engine of growth and achievement.

sextile.description: Planets support each other, but require conscious effort to activate the benefit.

sun_moon.conjunction: Single-minded focus; ego and emotions are aligned.
sun_moon.square: Internal struggle between wants (Sun) and needs (Moon).
sun_moon.opposition: Pull between career/self and home/family. Born near a full moon.
sun_moon.trine: Inner harmony; naturally comfortable with oneself.

venus_mars.conjunction: Charismatic and passionate. Love and desire are fused.
venus_mars.square: Volatile relationships. Intense passion that can turn into conflict.
venus_mars.trine: Easy sexual and romantic flow. Naturally attracts others.
venus_mars.opposition: Attraction to polar opposites. Relationships are a seesaw of passion.

mercury_saturn.conjunction: Serious mind. Excellent for concentration but prone to pessimism.
mercury_saturn.square: Mental blockages or harsh self-criticism. Needs to work to trust one's voice.
mercury_saturn.trine: Disciplined thinking. Good for mathematics, architecture, and planning.

mc.name: Midheaven
mc.meaning: Career, public reputation, status, and life goal.

ic.name: Imum Coeli
ic.meaning: Roots, home, ancestry, and the private self.

descendant.name: Descendant
descendant.meaning: The shadow self; qualities we seek in partners.

north_node.meaning: Karmic destiny. The direction the soul is evolving toward; feels unfamiliar.

south_node.meaning: Karmic past. Talents and habits brought from the past; feels comfortable but stagnant.

chiron.name: Chiron
chiron.meaning: The Wounded Healer. Represents a deep spiritual wound we must heal in ourselves to heal others.
chiron.sign_impact: Shows the *nature* of the wound (e.g., Aries = wound to self-worth).
chiron.house_impact: Shows the *area of life* where the wound plays out.
